settings.heading: OtterBox
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts has partnered with OtterBox to bring you rugged smartphone and tablet mounts for uniVERSE and defender cases. Find mounting solutions for Apple iPhones, iPads, and Samsung Galaxy phones and tablets. Easily configure your vehicle mount or use it as part of a kickstand at your desk, all while keeping your phone or tablet protected in its OtterBox uniVERSE case. Explore the full line of OtterBox mounts below.

settings.heading: Form-Fit Powered Holders
settings.copy: The RAM® EZ-Roll’r™ phone holder secures your OtterBox uniVERSE-protected iPhone or Samsung Galaxy smartphone, allowing you to utilize the RAM® Twist-Lock™ Suction Cup, or other RAM® components making this the ideal OtterBox car mount. For anyone who demands both protection and versatility with an OtterBox phone holder, the combination of the uniVERSE case and the RAM® double ball and socket system is the answer.

settings.heading: Connect Your Keyboard & Other Peripherals
settings.copy: The RAM® Quick Release Adapter connects to the back of the OtterBox uniVERSE case for any iPad or Samsung Galaxy tablet, making this a perfect OtterBox tablet mount. This octagon-shaped adapter can adapt to almost any RAM® double ball and socket mounting system. When not mounted, attach accessories like the GDS® Hand-Stand™ – a two-in-one accessory that integrates a hand strap with a built-in kickstand.

settings.heading: Tab Active3 + OtterBox uniVERSE
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts has designed new tablet docks in collaboration with Samsung and OtterBox featuring uniVERSE compatibility for the Samsung Galaxy Tab Active3. These docks include a power only option as well as single and dual peripheral, enabled via USB connectors. Take advantage of integrated pogo pin contacts that line up perfectly with the tablet's pogo pads to initiate charging capabilities whiled docked. Learn more about all dock features below.

settings.heading: uniVERSE GDS® Module
settings.copy: Integrate charging and data sync capabilities to your OtterBox uniVERSE-protected tablet with this GDS® module. The built-in Type-C or Lightning connector attaches to your tablet’s charging port, and universal docking contacts on the outside of the module pair with any GDS® Dock – ideal for the home or enterprise use.

settings.heading: Venture Cooler Mounts
settings.copy: Accessorize your OtterBox Venture Cooler with a wide variety of RAM® mounting solutions perfect for any outdoor adventure. With the use of the RAM® Twist-Lock™ Suction Cup for flat surface mounting and the RAM® Tough-Claw™ on the handles, you can easily mount your beverage, phone, umbrella, flashlight, fishing rod, camera, bluetooth speaker, and much more.
